data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 25,453 believers living in Plateaux, Republic of Congo.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Plateaux, Republic of Congo
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Plateaux, Republic of Congo.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Plateaux.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 25,453 believers in Plateaux to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Over 14.51 percent of the people of Plateaux are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Father, you gave the church of Plateaux, Republic of Congo the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Plateaux, Republic of Congo to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.section_summary:
the state of Plateaux, Republic of Congo has a population of 174,600.

We estimate Plateaux has 25,453 people who might know Jesus, 123,807 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 25,340 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 6 neighbors who need Jesus.
